text:
Can anyone inform me on how to remove the Image Fields Width and Height, so they do not display, I noticed there is a `size_type` but there is no documentation of what other properties that can be set to based on this documentation: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/module-theme-fields>:

```// Image field
{
  "name" : "bg_img",
  "label" : "Background Image",
  "required" : false,
  "locked" : false,
  "responsive" : true,
  "resizable" : true,
  "show_loading" : false,
  "type" : "image",
  "default" : {
    "size_type" : "auto",
    "src" : "",
    "alt" : null,
    "loading": "disabled"
  }
}```
Looks like setting resizable to `false` works
hello!, is there a way to develop a module in which i can use css for emails?
